desc: Sage & Solo Homepage - easy access to finding your next favorite soy candle products. We carry wood wick candles in large jars, tealight samples, and even soy wax melt tarts. All of our products are non-toxic and hand-poured in Orlando, FL. They are the best soy candle products on the market!

layout.text: hello sunshine, take a look around
Sustainability, transparency & simplicity— shop our handmade candles and goods.
